name: oto

relating to the ears: The doctor peered into the boy's ear with her otoscope. Otoacoustic emissions are echoes that the normal ear produces in response to an incoming sound.
More examplesFewer examplesOtoplasty (pinning back the ears) can be done starting at the age of 5 or 6.Otolaryngologists are fretting over a coming boom in hearing loss.He is chief of the department of otolaryngology at Kelsey-Seybold Clinic.
